hero.trusted: Approuvé par les clubs et le personnel
hero.title: Révolutionner
hero.title_highlight: la Gestion des Clubs de Football
hero.subtitle: TACTEC unifie la science du sport, le médical, le tactique et les opérations dans une seule plateforme claire pour chaque département.

injury.label: Moins de blessures des tissus mous

challenge.title: Les opérations fragmentées ralentissent les clubs
challenge.subtitle: Les données sont dispersées. Les flux de travail sont manuels. Les informations arrivent tard.

staff.title: Alignement du Personnel
staff.desc: Les équipes médicales, d'entraînement et d'analyse travaillent en silos avec des efforts dupliqués.

workflows.title: Flux de Travail Manuels
workflows.desc: Les rapports, la planification et la communication sont répartis entre plusieurs outils et feuilles de calcul.

insights.title: Informations Lentes
insights.desc: Les décisions reposent sur des informations retardées ou incomplètes.

solution.title: Un système d'exploitation pour votre club
solution.subtitle: Rassemblez les personnes, les processus et les performances avec TACTEC.

connect.title: Connect every department
connect.desc: Unify coaching, medical, performance, and operations data in a single timeline.

coordinate.title: Coordinate smarter workflows
coordinate.desc: Automate approvals, wellness checks, and match planning without leaving the platform.

measure.title: Measure what matters
measure.desc: Dashboards highlight readiness, injury risk, and training loads in real time.

items.clarity: Shared context for coaches, analysts, medics, and players.
items.speed: Minutes saved daily on reporting and approvals.
items.confidence: Decision support backed by live data and video.

features.title: Tout ce dont votre personnel a besoin
features.subtitle: Gestion d'équipe, tableaux tactiques, bien-être et médical, rapports et plus encore.

medical.title: Integrated medical hub
medical.desc: Treatment notes, injury history, and rehab protocols connected to daily availability.

performance.title: Performance intelligence
performance.desc: Track external and internal loads with automated readiness scoring.

tactical.title: Immersive tactical tools
tactical.desc: Interactive match plans, player tasks, and live session visualisation.

operations.title: Club operations
operations.desc: Travel, equipment, and compliance managed with configurable workflows.

items.mobile: Native player and staff apps in 8 languages.
items.security: Enterprise-grade roles, permissions, and audit logs.

tech.title: Architecture propre. Multi-plateforme. Rapide.
tech.subtitle: Stack moderne, conception universelle et un moteur graphique puissant.

cloud.title: Secure cloud infrastructure
cloud.desc: Hosted in EU data centres with automated backups and encryption.

analytics.title: Analytics-ready data
analytics.desc: Well-defined APIs feed BI tools and scouting platforms effortlessly.

access.title: Accessible everywhere
access.desc: Responsive web, mobile apps, and offline capture for travel days.

cta.title: Voyez TACTEC en action
cta.subtitle: Demandez une démo en direct ou essayez l'application joueur.

footer.about: TACTEC par Ventio. Conçu pour les clubs professionnels et les académies.
footer.made: Fait avec soin pour le football.

faq.a1: TACTEC est un système d'exploitation unifié pour les clubs de football couvrant le médical, le tactique, les performances et les opérations.
faq.a2: Oui. L'interface prend en charge l'arabe, le portugais (UE), le portugais brésilien, l'espagnol, le français, l'italien, l'allemand et l'anglais.
faq.a3: Contactez-nous pour une démo en direct et un plan d'intégration.

meta.title: Contact - TACTEC
meta.description: Get in touch with TACTEC team for demos and inquiries. Transform your football club operations with our professional platform.
meta.ogTitle: Contact TACTEC - Football Club Management Platform
meta.ogDescription: Request a demo or get in touch with our team to learn how TACTEC can transform your club operations.

header.title: Get in Touch
header.subtitle: Ready to transform your club? Request a demo or contact our team.

status.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

metrics.title: Operational gains delivered
metrics.subtitle: TACTEC helps clubs reclaim time and improve player care from day one.

satisfaction.label: Staff satisfaction
satisfaction.desc: Teams report higher clarity in daily schedules.

reporting.label: Reporting saved weekly
reporting.desc: Automated dashboards replace manual spreadsheet updates.

recovery.label: Faster return-to-play decisions
recovery.desc: Unified medical notes accelerate interdisciplinary sign-off.

testimonials.title: Trusted by progressive clubs
testimonials.subtitle: Leaders across leagues rely on TACTEC to unite staff and unlock performance.

director.quote: TACTEC finally gives our staff a single version of truth. Training loads, rehab, and match prep now live together.

coach.quote: We move from training ground to match day with the same workflows. Staff actually enjoys updating the platform.
